name: Labyrinth (itch) (DDRKirby(ISQ))
description:
Labyrinth v1.01
Arrow keys to move, Up or Space to jump.

Soundtrack download

Labyrinth was made in 48 hours for round 31 of Ludum Dare. The theme was "Entire Game on One Screen", so I made a 2D puzzle platformer where the level rearranges itself to present new puzzles to you.

Awards (out of 1353 compo entries):

  • #1 in Audio
  • #7 in Overall
  • #8 in Fun

Ludum Dare submission page
